meanings.definition: The state or quality of being invulnerable.
meanings.sent1: His invulnerableness in the game made him the champion.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's invulnerableness protected him from all harm.
meanings.sent3: The knight's invulnerableness was so strong that even dragons feared him.
meanings.sent4: Her invulnerableness in the face of adversity was like an impenetrable shield.
meanings.sent5: The invulnerableness of the fortress walls was unmatched in the kingdom.

meanings.definition: The ability to withstand or resist injury or harm.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's invulnerableness in battle was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: The turtle's shell provides a natural invulnerableness against predators.
meanings.sent3: The cat's invulnerableness to tickles always made the children laugh.
meanings.sent4: His invulnerableness to criticism was like a suit of armor.
meanings.sent5: The mountain's invulnerableness to erosion stood the test of time.

meanings.sent1: The queen's invulnerableness to political scandals was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artifact's invulnerableness to decay puzzled archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The robot's invulnerableness to water made it the perfect lifeguard.
meanings.sent4: The fortress's invulnerableness to siege was legendary in the region.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's invulnerableness to bullets amazed the onlookers.
